pageContext.claim: “We have a very special group of people with us today. These are escapees from North Korea. There have been many of them over the last year, and there seems to be more and more.”
pageContext.analysis: The number of defectors in 2017 was 1,127, a decline of 21 percent from the year before and the lowest since Kim Jong Un took power in 2011, the South Korean government reported.
